text: Creative Artists Agency LLC (CAA) is an American talent and sports agency based in Los Angeles, California. It is regarded as an influential company in the talent agency business and manages numerous clients. In March 2016, CAA had 1,800 employees. ==References== ==Further reading== * A History of CAA and Coke, by Hein, Kenneth, Benezra, Karen,Brandweek, 10644318, January 16, 2006, Vol. 47, Issue 3. * == Other websites == * CAA Touring * CAA Speakers * CAA Entertainment * CAA Sports Category:Companies of the United States
title: Creative Artists Agency
